skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: slow german podcast
des: Slow German is a private podcast for students of the German language – especially for those who already have intermediate skills. Slow German is produced by Annik Rubens alias Larissa Vassilian from Munich, Germany. Every episode is short and slowly spoken – the topics include German culture, society and history.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
